Page 1294

From Hugh Hurwitz

Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) OAG] "(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)" [usdoj.gov](mailto:usdoj.gov)
Date: 8/11/19 7:00 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov](mailto:bop.gov)
Subject: timeline
>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG] "08/11/2019 19:00 >>>
Hugh/Ray: Can you verify that the information below is accurate? It's based in large part on the timeline you sent.
Is there any reason why this information shouldn't be released to the public?
[b(6);
(b)(7)(c)
On July 23d, Epstein was placed on suicide watch and received medical evaluation. Epstein received daily psychological evaluations while on suicide watch.
On July 29th Epstein was removed from suicide watch by Psychology Services Department at MCC-New York after daily interaction with him and according
On August 9th at about 8:00 a.m., Epstein's cellmate was taken out of the institution for a Court appearance. That inmate was eventually released from custody.
On August 9th at about 12:00 a.m., while in his cell, Epstein acknowledged a Correction Officer performing a routine check. After midnight, it appears
On August 10th at approximately 6:33 a.m., Staff serving breakfast meal found Epstein unresponsive in his cell. Staff called for assistance and began CPR.
Page 4108
DOJ-OGR-00025484

Date: 8/11/19 7:00 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov](mailto:bop.gov)
Subject: timeline

>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG] "08/11/2019 19:00 >>>
Hugh/Ray: Can you verify that the information below is accurate? It's based in large part on the timeline you sent.
Is there any reason why this information shouldn't be released to the public?

[b(6);
(b)(7)(c)
On July 23d, Epstein was placed on suicide watch and received medical evaluation. Epstein received daily psychological evaluations while on suicide watch.
On July 29th Epstein was removed from suicide watch by Psychology Services Department at MCC-New York after daily interaction with him and according
On August 9th at about 8:00 a.m., Epstein's cellmate was taken out of the institution for a Court appearance. That inmate was eventually released from custody.
On August 9th at about 12:00 a.m., while in his cell, Epstein acknowledged a Correction Officer performing a routine check. After midnight, it appears
On August 10th at approximately 6:33 a.m., Staff serving breakfast meal found Epstein unresponsive in his cell. Staff called for assistance and began CPR.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a redacted email chain discussing Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and death. The redactions are indicated by [b(6); (b)(7)(C)].
